mean_en: if you are attracted by something, it interests you and makes you want it; if you are attracted by somebody, you like or admire them; to make somebody/something come somewhere or take part in something; to make people have a particular reaction
sentence: This dog attracts many people to the fruit stall.
sentence_trans: 这只狗吸引了很多人来这个水果摊。
word_etyma: at一再 + tract拉 → 拉过来 → attract吸引
